pr_title: NXP-21725: make LongProperty wrap any NumberFormatException

timeline.bodyText: These ones should be cleared because unused.
timeline.author: kevinleturc

timeline.message:
NXP-21725: make LongProperty wrap any NumberFormatException

When setting a non-integer String to a LongProperty, make sure
a PropertyConversionException is thrown so that callers can handle it correctly,
such as in the BinaryMetadataService

NXP-21725: make LongProperty wrap any NumberFormatException

When setting a non-integer String to a LongProperty, make sure
a PropertyConversionException is thrown so that callers can handle it correctly,
such as in the BinaryMetadataService

NXP-21725: make LongProperty and DoubleProperty wrap any NumberFormatException

a PropertyConversionException is thrown so that callers can handle it correctly,
such as in the BinaryMetadataService

NXP-21725: make LongProperty and DoubleProperty wrap any NumberFormatException

such as in the BinaryMetadataService
